text: Ea tataisoang Ea Allah, o tataisong e nepahetseng; Ea mo tlohetseng ho kheloha, a ke ke a fumana mots’ireletsi kantle ho Eena, Re tla ba bokella ‘moho mohla Letsatsi la Kahlolo ba tjapalletse ka lifahleho, ba foufetse, e le limumu esitana le litholo; lehae la bona e tla ba Lihele; ka linako tsohle ha li kokobela, Re tla li phaella ka lelakabe
